page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Being an{agricultural area,}farming is the most obvious source of employ_ ment.But a larger %age of the popula_ tion here{commute}by car or bus(there is a regular,convenient service)into large nearby settlements eg.Oswestry (only 4km away at its furthest),Welsh_ pool(12km away from Llynclys)or Shrew_ sbury.Many people in our area work in Dol_y_Goch quarry,east of and outside our area.Because the area is{sparsely {populated}there is{little unemployment among the residents compared to that expected and found in large nearby settlements.However,this part of Shro_ pshire in general has low unemployment The younger section of the populat_ ion prefer to work in large settle_ ments outside the area,where there are more leisure facilities for them and wages are generally higher.
